name: SpellingChallenge
body:
# Our project:

Team Member:  Tom Kinser

App Title: Spelling Challenge


App Description: Application which test students with spelling lists which are user inputted.

App Target Audience: K-8

App Features: 


Input:  User typed or OCR Scanning.

Output:  User prompted by audio that is either automatically synthesized or custom inputted by user.

Sharing:  Lists could be shared amoung students by email, 'bumping', or cloud.

Network Requirements:  Needed for word set-up, not for testing.

Device Compatibility:  Application could be run on iPad, IPhone, or iTouch.

Feedback:  Results could be provided to user, email, or a central 'top score' cloud location.

Retest:  Later tests of same list could be based on previous results (i.e. retest only incorrect words).

Game:  Could incorporate 'game' styles of play (crossword puzzles, word search, ...).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
